thread.title: Lauryn Hill Delays Makeup Concert For Pittsburgh Show That Started Late

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Lauryn Hill Delays Makeup Concert For Pittsburgh Show That Started Late

organizations.name: lauryn hill delays makeup concert for pittsburgh show that started late lauryn hill delays makeup concert for pittsburgh

text:
Lauryn Hill Delays Makeup Concert For Pittsburgh Show That Started Late February 27, 2017 11:25 AM Filed Under: Byham Theater , Lauryn Hill , Pittsburgh Cultural Trust NEW YORK - NOVEMBER 13: (EXCLUSIVE ACCESS - PREMIUM RATES APPLY) Singer Lauryn Hill performs during the Michael J. Fox Foundation's 2010 Benefit "A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Cure Parkinson's" at The Waldorf=Astoria on November 13, 2010 in New York City. (Photo by Andrew H. Walker/Getty Images for the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research) 
PITTSBURGH (AP) – Singer-rapper Lauryn Hill has postponed a Pittsburgh concert that was scheduled to make up for one last month that started more than three hours late. 
The Pittsburgh Cultural Trust says Tuesday’s show at the Byham Theater has been moved to June 2 “due to a scheduling conflict.” 
Hill’s representatives didn’t immediately comment on the situation, and her Facebook page still listed the Byham show. 
On Jan. 31, Hill took the stage at 11:20 p.m. for a Heinz Hall show advertised as starting at 8 p.m.
